title: Watch: How Cambodian runner Bou Samnang completed 5,000m race at SEA Games in an inspiring effort
content:
Even if you're in last place. 🏃Even if the weather is terrible. 🌧️Even if it feels like you can't do it. 🚫𝙉𝙚𝙫𝙚𝙧 𝙜𝙞𝙫𝙚 𝙪𝙥 💪Nothing was going to stop Cambodia's Bou Samnang 🇰🇭 from finishing the women's 5,000 metre race at the #SEAGames. pic.twitter.com/iVMxwqVrFQ— The Olympic Games (@Olympics) May 9, 2023

Cambodia's Bou Samnang refused to quit and completed the women's 5,000m at the Southeast Asian Games despite being engulfed by a heavy rainstorm pic.twitter.com/A3QFlHZf9N— Guardian sport (@guardian_sport) May 9, 2023
